slash.title: It's not possible to use normal commands anymore
slash.description:
The traditional commands were discontinued and replaced by Slash Commands (Commands from /).
Type `/ping` and check if my ping command appears, if it doesn't, update my permissions on your server, re-inviting me to the server :3 
You can update clicking in this [link](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=737044809650274325&scope=bot+applications.commands&permissions=269872255) or using the new Discord function:

ban.title: ‚ùå | You have been **BANNED**
ban.description:
If you want to do a ban appeal, you need to do this form: (linkdoform) 

You need to read Foxy's [ToS](https://foxywebsite.xyz/privacy)

messageCreate.hello: Hey, I'm Foxy! My prefix is `/ (Slash Commands)`, use `/help` for help!
